File_Description: File-level metadata associated with dataset. This file is an updated version (version 3) of the file-level metadata file.
Data dictionary defining column headers and other terms across the dataset. This file is an updated version (version 3) of the data dictionary file.

Location information for the sites containing data. This file contains both Location_IDs and the latitude and longitude measurements associated with the Location_IDs. Latitude and longitude measurements are in WGS84 format.
Data for liquid water delta2H measured in parts per thousand. Asterisk marks Location_ID for which the location the data is collected from.
Data for liquid water delta18O measured in parts per thousand. Asterisk marks Location_ID for which the location the data is collected from.
